description: Samsung's One UI 7 update is expected to arrive in early 2025, which means that the software isn't expected to arrive on the company's smartphones for the next couple of months. However, a tipster has now leaked details of the expected rollout of Samsung's upcoming One UI 7 beta release.
title: Samsung One UI 7 Beta Release Timeline Tipped to Debut by Mid-November

description: Apple has launched a service program addressing a rear camera issue in certain iPhone 14 Plus models produced over the span of one year. iPhone 14 Plus units impacted by this issue will be eligible for free servicing at authorised Apple service providers, according to the company while customers who already paid for repairs can contact the company for a refund.
title: iPhone 14 Plus Service Program for Rear Camera Issue Announced by Apple: Check Eligibility

description: Apple will purchase Pixelmator, the maker of a popular high-end photo-editing app for iPhone, iPad, and Mac computers. Pixelmator said in a blog post that its team would be joining the iPhone maker. Apple's customers should gain access to a high-end photo editing app for the first time since the company discontinued Aperture.
title: Apple to Buy Pixelmator, Maker of Popular Photo-Editing Apps

description: Oppo Find X8 Mini could be launched in the coming months, alongside the purported Find X8 Ultra model, according to a Chinese tipster. These handsets could join the recently launched Oppo Find X8 and Find X8 Pro models, and the Find X8 Mini could compete with the Vivo X200 Pro Mini.
title: Oppo Find X8 Mini Tipped to Launch Soon; Might Compete With Vivo X200 Pro Mini

description: Nothing is exploring the development of its own mobile operating system, according to a statement from Nothing CEO and founder Carl Pei at TechCrunch Disrupt. The company's devices currently run on Google's Android system, like smartphones from most companies except Huawei and Apple.
title: Nothing Exploring Development of Own Mobile OS as Android Alternative, Carl Pei Says

description: Apple is set to invest as much as $1.5 billion in Globalstar, as the iPhone maker looks to enhance the satellite communication services available on its smartphones. The agreement includes a $1.1 billion cash investment by Apple, along with a $400 million purchase for a 20% equity stake in Globalstar. The satellite firm plans to allocate some of the investment towards reducing its debt.
title: Apple to Invest Up to $1.5 Billion in Globalstar for Satellite Coverage Expansion

description: Walt Disney is establishing a new Office of Technology Enablement to oversee the integration of emerging technologies like artificial intelligence and mixed reality. The new unit will concentrate on rapidly evolving technological fields, including AI and mixed reality, which merge the physical and digital realms.
title: Walt Disney Forms Business Unit to Coordinate Use of AI, Augmented Reality
